title: tTorrent Pro - Torrent Client v1.4.0
description:
tTorrent Pro - Torrent Client v1.4.0 Patched
Requirements: ARM based devices, Android OS 2.1 and up
Overview: tTorrent is simply the best bittorrent client for Android based devices.
Image

Features:
- UNLIMITED DOWNLOAD SPEED!
- download single files from torrents with multiple files
- multiple torrent downloading, queuing
- search for torrents
- Wifi only mode, Wifi or WiMAX mode
- able to set Upload/Download speed in options
- web browser integration
- magnet link support
- trackerless torrent (DHT) support
- RSS support(automatically download torrents published in feeds)
- UPnP and NAT-PMP support
- IP filtering support
- proxy support(SOCKS, HTTP)
- encryption
- Local Peer Discovery
- creating torrents

What's New
New icon, designed by Joseph Raphael.
Torrents under download can be moved to new location.
Sequential download checkbox on add torrent/magnet dialog, don't reset Sequential download when reloading torrents.
Label support for RSS feeds. Labels support custom save path.
Added option to force english locale.
Force start at boot option.
Updated translations.

Release info:
Patched version, no lucky patcher or Google Play MOD needed!

This app has no advertisements
